Welcome to Serviuno Courier.

Welcome to Freight Central. You are growing your business and expanding your shipping? Have you got questions about shipping Freight? We have got answers! Find below the step-by-step information and solutions you need to get started.
Sea Freight Shipping

International sea freight forwarding services not only arranges for appropriate vessels but also handles the related formalities along with constant tracking of the shipment while it's in transit.

Serviuno Courier as one of the leading international sea freight forwarders has wide experience in international sea freight forwarding services. It ensures efficient handling of your cargo. We offer both FCL and LCL service with a wide range, to choose from, ocean carriers. This allows us the flexbility to provide more frequent sailings, additionaal vessel space and reliable schedules.

Air Freight Shipping

Ship to domestic as well as international locations quickly and securely with our superior air freight shipping services.

  • Urgent - For urgent and ultra-secure shipments, Choose urgent air freight shipping. This is the faster route your cargo can take with immediat confirmation of orders.

  • Priority - Typical transit time is 1 to 2 days from origin to destination. Priority is ideal for time-critical shipments. All consignments are scheduled for the next direct flight or fastest available connection.

  • Standard - Typical transit time is 3 to 4 days from origin to destination. Standard provides a cost-effective and timely solution, as we serve most destinations several times a week and major business centers daily.

  • Economy - Typical transit time is 5 to 6 days from origin to destination. Where transit times are less critical, we recommend Economy; it is our most economical freight service.

    Choose the industry's most reliable freight company to handle all of your global air freight needs.

Rail Freight Shipping

Reduce shipping costs while maintaining dependability by using Serviuno Courier's renowned rail freight shipping service.

Rail freight shipping can be a serviceable alternative to more expensive shipping services. Our rail freight service is not only easy on your budget but also provides you with unparalleled reliability.

Expedited Freight Shipping

Take advantage of our outstanding expedited freight shipping services delivered on-time daily to locations all around the world.

With access to virtually every type of freight shipping vehicle available, we can coordinate any shipment across the globe. Our experienced logistics team can deliver time-critical solutions that meet your freight shipping budget with industry standard reliability.

Third Party Agency

We act as a trusted middle-man fir both the seller and buyer, offering them great security and fast movement for national and international transactions. Our fees are not cheap, but still, when dealing with your money or merchandise as we do the money is not important. If you will not be satisfied with our way of dealing with your belongings then we will refund you with any fee you have paid.

Unlike our competitiors, we process all your paperwork and label all your packages, saving you the stress of complicated jargon and confusing paperwork, so all you need to do is pack your goods into a suitable box.

Services We Offer

Sea Shipping

Be rest assured shipping with us.

Air Transport

Air Freight, delivering in no time.

Truck Delivery

All vehicles to be shipped using our company without a thorough technical and legal inspection of the specific vehicle will not be accepted.

LTL - Less Than Truckload

Serviuno Courier offers a full range of less than truckload (LTL) services. Utilizeour extensive regional, long haul and international freight shipping services for a sound, on-time delivery of your less than truckload (LTL) freight shipments

Additional Freight Shipping Services include: Guaranteed Services. Residential. Business. Hazardous Materials (Hazmat). Expedited Delivery Services.

TL - Full Truckload

Insist on the best? Our experienced motor freight & truckng professionals provide safe and reliable full truckload (TL) freight shipping services throughout the Europe, USA, Japan and China.
